name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程旨在介紹細胞培養及基因工程之方法與應用。課程內容涵蓋微生物的培養, DNA的純化, 原核與真核細胞的載體, 基因的選殖等基因工程技術及其應用。
schedule:
1. Introdcution
2. Vectors for gene cloning
3. Purifiction of DNA from living cells
4. Manipulation of purified DNA (I)
5. Manipulation of purified DNA (II)
6. Introduction of DNA into living cells
7. Cloning vectors for E. coli (I)
8. Cloning vectors for E. coli (II)
9. Exam 1
10. Cloning vectors for eukaryotes (I)
11. Cloning vectors for eukaryotes (II)
12. How to obtain a clone of a specific gene
13. The polymerase chain reaction
14. Production of protein from a cloned genes
15. Exam 2
16. Presentation
17. Presentation
18. Presentation
materials:
教科書
原文:"Gene cloning and DNA analysis, An introduction" by T.A. Brown, 6/E (藝軒圖書)
翻譯本: "基因工程與生物技術" 何國傑等譯, 原文第五版  (藝軒圖書)
參考書
1. "應用分子生物學" 李昭𠮏著, 第二版  (藝軒圖書)
2. "Molecular biotechnology, Principles and applications of recombinant DNA" by Glick, Pasternak, and Patten, 4/E (藝軒圖書)
